thread.title: Charlize Theron opts for comfort over style on outing with son Jackson
thread.title_full: Charlize Theron opts for comfort over style on outing with son Jackson

title: Charlize Theron opts for comfort over style on outing with son Jackson
text: Charlize Theron opts for comfort over style on outing with son Jackson Saturday, 10 October 2015 (1 minute ago) Charlize, 40, was in full mother-on-duty mode as she was pictured enjoying a fun day out with her adopted son Jackson in Los Angeles, California, on Thursday.
